content.rendered:
John is an associate lecturer at Regent College London and teaching Computer Security. He has been Senior Lecturer in Computing Science, teaching in higher education in the UK for over twenty five years. He has BA in Art and Science at Governors State University the USA in 1993, and a Post Graduate Diploma in Interactive Computer Systems at Middlesex University 1996 in the UK. He also teaches HNC and HND Internet of Things Projects, eCommerce Strategy, Computer Games, Artificial Intelligence, and level 3 Advanced Networking.

He worked as technical and education consultant for government, corporate, and boutique developments of the internet and computer multimedia. Before the internet, he worked as a photo journalist in Washington DC, and before that worked in New York City as corporate and cable TV producer for studio and field production, as well as interactive video entertainment in night clubs, and disco’s.
